author: @mmalayen
text: hai semua, aku dari 2024. Dulu, saat pertama kali nonton mv ini tidak terlintas dipikiran saya di masa yang akan datang NCT akan menjadi seperti itu, aku hanya ingin mengatakan kepada kalian aku tidak menyesali apa yang terjadi, tapi siapa sangka semua nya akan menjadi seperti itu? saya sangat ingin kita kembali ke masa ini tapi waktu juga harus tetap berjalan. kalian sudah melakukan yang terbaik guys, kalian sudah bekerja keras dengan baik, semoga kalian makan enak dan sehat, semoga banyak hal baik yang datang, semoga makin banyak yang mengenal NCT, tolong ingat juga NCT pernah ada di masa ini. dan untuk NCT WISH selamat bergabung, kalian sangat diterima dengan baik oleh NCTZEN❤❤

text:
진짜 노래가 주는 힘은 대단한거 같다
이거 처음 나왔을때 20명 넘는 다인원이 다같이 참여한 곡이라고 해서ㅋㅋ… 솔직히 뇌절이라고 생각했는데
이상하지… 정말 힘들때 이 노래가 문득 떠오르더라 
왜인지는 모르겠어ㅋㅋㅋ 가사랑 멜로디가 희망적이여서 그런지 그냥 갑자기 이 노래가 떠오르더라 
덕분에 잘 버티고 지나갔어… 노래가 주는 힘은 정말 대단하구나
너네는 누군가의 힘을 주는 존재야… 고맙다

author: @tripujilestari7436
text:
You're the most important person in your life

So be yourself, be beautiful

[Verse 1: Jaehyun, Jaemin & Jaehyun, Jungwoo, Chenle]

Geu nugungaui saleul dalgi wihae

Godanhan harul bonaetdeon geudae

Jami deul ttae haengbokaji antamyeon

Moduga baran kkumeul jjochabwado

An manneun otcheoreom jakku deo jagajyeo

Nae tasin geoya igeoppunirago

Pogihaji marayo

[Chorus: All, Haechan, Ten]

Bami omyeon bicheul naeneun byeoldeuldo

Noeulman namgin chae jineun jeo taeyangdo

Da jeomada dokteukan saegeul gajyeo

Beautiful, beautiful, yeah

Sesang modeun ge jejaril chajeul ttae

Deo areumdapge binnaneun geon waeilkka

Geu moseup geudaero chungbunhaeyo

Beautiful, beautiful you are

[Verse 2: Jisung & Renjun, Xiaojun, Doyoung & Sungchan, Taeil]

Naegen eopdaneun geureon heotalhame

Geu nugungareul bureowohaetjyo

Geudae gajin geon

Geudeuregen jeoldae eopseo, yeah

Gogael jom deureobwa juwireul dulleobwa

Geudaeman baraboneun saramdeuri itjana

Hanappunin sarangbanneun saram

Geudaen geureon saram

[Chorus: All, Yuta, Renjun]

Bami omyeon bicheul naeneun byeoldeuldo

Noeulman namgin chae jineun jeo taeyangdo

Da jeomada dokteukan saegeul gajyeo

Beautiful, beautiful, yeah

Sesang modeun ge jejaril chajeul ttae

Deo areumdapge binnaneun geon waeilkka

Geu moseup geudaero chungbunhaeyo

Beautiful, beautiful you are

[Bridge: Haechan, Johnny & Jungwoo, Doyoung & Kun, Jaehyun & Shotaro, *Yangyang & Ten*, **Taeil**]

Gaseumi oechineun sorireul deureobwayo

Gaseum ttwineun sungani isseotgetjyo

Haengbogeul chaja hemaego innayo

Jom deo maeumui soril deureobwa

*sijakae geudaemanui yeohaeng

Gippeumeul chajaganeun geudaemanui story*

**jageun geot hanakkaji

Saranghaneun maeum itji marayo**

[Verse 3: Taeyong, Jeno, Hendery, Taeil, *Mark*]

Beautiful life, beautiful heart

Salui balgeun myeoneseo

Tteottteosi jasineul bwa

Jagajyeo ganeun gakjaui bit

Nopajyeo ganeun mokpyochi

Soge geudaemanui saek inneun geudaero

Deoukdeo balge binnal su itgil

This time you can face the rain

Next time you can beat the pain

No more tears will come again

Smiling, laughing to the end (Yeah)

*Put your bags down

Mugeoun simjeongeul naege da neomgyeo

Meomchwo isseo, time in a bottle

Neodo neol bwaya boyeo*

[Chorus: All, Chenle, Kun]

Bami omyeon bicheul naeneun byeoldeuldo

Noeulman namgin chae jineun jeo taeyangdo

Da jeomada dokteukan saegeul gajyeo

Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful

Sesang modeun ge jejaril chajeul ttae

Deo areumdapge binnaneun geon waeilkka

Geu moseup geudaero chungbunhaeyo

Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful you are

[Chorus: All, Xiaojun, Doyoung]

Saeropge sijakaeyo duryeowodo malgo

Modeun ge jal doel teni geokjeonghaji mayo

Jasineul minneun sungan geu sungan

Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful

Geudaen jiguui hanappunin geureon saram

Sesangeul binnaejul sunganeul gidaryeoyo

Geu moseup geudaero wanbyeokan geol

Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful you are

author: @petrichaliamalang9765
text:
what i really liked about the whole songs :

- distribution of lyrics for each members are more equal
- the visual , vocal , raps and dance are not jokes , 20 of them who performed
- get to see jisung leads his hyungs after 3 years , really getting emo for this because of ji feel like long time to not see him dance
- haechan,jungwoo,ten,kun, yuta,renjun,xiaojun,chenle ,jaemin, jaehyun, doyoung being the center of the chorus ( I really loved this )
- xiaojun's lyrics , chenle lyrics+angelic vocal , yangyang and ten ,hendery's part , mark's part are just nice
- the lyrics are very soothing and whenever I'm down, beautiful is on the top of playlist
-this whole song with the beautiful lyrics ever sang by 21 of nct , manifest for 23 of them soon , my fav number has been 23 yall
- taeil , doyoung , xiaojun , yuta ,kun, renjun, chenle being the best vocalist of nct 
- their expression during performing beautiful really convincing and as if everyone said " everyone can do it , fighting " 
-sungchan and shotaro being the luckiest member of nct and they shinee
- everyone shines either in visual , vocal , raps and dance

p/s: I dislike to differentiate them into nct2018, nct2020, nct2021.Because for me they are all NCT. NCT IS FOR SIJEUNI , AND SIJEUNI IS FOR NCT . OT23 comeback for beautiful , I MANIFEST !

author: @petrichaliamalang9765
text: in case yall forgot , jungwoo did the chorus part of Ten , and renjun and yangyang did Ten's part too . This is too sweet . I'm manifesting to see 23 of them to perform BEAUTIFUL altogether . I am grateful we have this 21 of them singing , 20 of them performing beautiful with live vocals , but I'm always aiming high to see all members , 23 of them altogether perform. I hope sm and nct did hear my wish , because I need to see 23 smiling faces . As hendery said , no more tears will come again , smiling until the end.  I want that goes to 23 of them. Don't care about haters , they are just existed to make each of us get motivated every day.

author: @nnadvyn
text:
ini saah satu lagu nct favorit aku 
kenal nct karena baca au di twitter, trus pas nonton youtube denger lagu nct ternyata seenak itu. inget banget waktu itu aku lagi down, banyak problem, ngerasa lelah banget sama hidup, dateng nct ke hidup aku yang bener bener ngerubah aku jadi orang yang lebih dewasa dan nerima kekurangan aku. nct bener bener ngasih kebahagiaan baru ke hidup aku, biarpun aku rau mereka gakenal bahkan sepertinya mereka gatau kalau aku hidup wkwk. jatuh cinta banget sama vokalis vokalis di nct, suara mereka sebagus itu. doyoung, xiaojun, chenle, renjun, haechan, taeil, jaehyun.. suara mereka bagus bangett, lagu" nct juga emang seenak sebagus senyaman itu ditelinga aku, thankyou udah hadir dihidup aku, kalian jadi salah satu kebahagiaan dari sedikit kebahagiaan yang aku punya ^ω^♡♡♡

author: @ayuzawa9203
text: Aside from the exceptional performance, I love how each of their outfits almost represent their personalities/aura. I am not a fashion major, but I love analyzing styles for fun. Each of them at least one clothing piece that would make you think "Ah, this is what *insert NCT member* loves to wear." It's meaningful because it's like they coordinated the clothes or at least the color scheme of their outfits according to their true selves, not to the idol image they have to live up to for a while.

author: @vilaniacerylia6428
text:
LYRIC

[Johnny] You’re the most important person
in your life
So be yourself
Be beautiful

[Jaehyun] geu nugungaui saleul dalgi wihae
godanhan harul bonaetdeon geudae
[Jaehyun / Jaemin] jami deul ttae haengbokaji antamyeon
[Jungwoo] moduga baran kkumeul jjochabwado
an manneun otcheoreom jakku deo jagajyeo

[Chenle] nae tasin geoya igeoppunirago
pogihaji marayo
[All] bami omyeon bicheul naeneun byeoldeuldo
noeulman namgin chae jineun jeo taeyangdo
[Haechan] da jeomada dokteukan saegeul gajyeo
Beautiful yeah

[All] sesang modeun ge jejaril chajeul ttae
deo areumdapge binnaneun geon waeilkka

Beautiful beautiful you are

geu nugungareul bureowohaetjyo

noeulman namgin chae jineun jeo taeyangdo

deo areumdapge binnaneun geon waeilkka

[Renjun] geu moseup geudaero chungbunhaeyo
Beautiful beautiful you are

[Johnny / Jungwoo] gaseum ttwineun sungani isseotgetjyo

Beautiful heart

1

in your life

author: @shintadwihapsari5742
text:
Intro: Johnny]

You're the most important person in your life

So be yourself, be beautiful

[Verse 1: Jaehyun, Jaemin & Jaehyun, Jungwoo, Chenle]

Geu nugungaui saleul dalgi wihae

Godanhan harul bonaetdeon geudae

Jami deul ttae haengbokaji antamyeon

Moduga baran kkumeul jjochabwado

An manneun otcheoreom jakku deo jagajyeo

Nae tasin geoya igeoppunirago

Pogihaji marayo

[Chorus: All, Haechan, Ten]

Bami omyeon bicheul naeneun byeoldeuldo

Noeulman namgin chae jineun jeo taeyangdo

Da jeomada dokteukan saegeul gajyeo

Beautiful, beautiful, yeah

Sesang modeun ge jejaril chajeul ttae

Deo areumdapge binnaneun geon waeilkka

Geu moseup geudaero chungbunhaeyo

Beautiful, beautiful you are

[Verse 2: Jisung & Renjun, Xiaojun, Doyoung & Sungchan, Taeil]

Naegen eopdaneun geureon heotalhame

Geu nugungareul bureowohaetjyo

Geudae gajin geon

Geudeuregen jeoldae eopseo, yeah

Gogael jom deureobwa juwireul dulleobwa

Geudaeman baraboneun saramdeuri itjana

Hanappunin sarangbanneun saram

Geudaen geureon saram

[Chorus: All, Yuta, Renjun]

Bami omyeon bicheul naeneun byeoldeuldo

Noeulman namgin chae jineun jeo taeyangdo

Da jeomada dokteukan saegeul gajyeo

Beautiful, beautiful, yeah

Sesang modeun ge jejaril chajeul ttae

Deo areumdapge binnaneun geon waeilkka

Geu moseup geudaero chungbunhaeyo

Beautiful, beautiful you are

[Bridge: Haechan, Johnny & Jungwoo, Doyoung & Kun, Jaehyun & Shotaro, *Yangyang & Ten*, **Taeil**]

Gaseumi oechineun sorireul deureobwayo

Gaseum ttwineun sungani isseotgetjyo

Haengbogeul chaja hemaego innayo

Jom deo maeumui soril deureobwa

*sijakae geudaemanui yeohaeng

Gippeumeul chajaganeun geudaemanui story*

**jageun geot hanakkaji

Saranghaneun maeum itji marayo**

[Verse 3: Taeyong, Jeno, Hendery, Taeil, *Mark*]

Beautiful life, beautiful heart

Salui balgeun myeoneseo

Tteottteosi jasineul bwa

Jagajyeo ganeun gakjaui bit

Nopajyeo ganeun mokpyochi

Soge geudaemanui saek inneun geudaero

Deoukdeo balge binnal su itgil

This time you can face the rain

Next time you can beat the pain

No more tears will come again

Smiling, laughing to the end (Yeah)

*Put your bags down

Mugeoun simjeongeul naege da neomgyeo

Meomchwo isseo, time in a bottle
Neodo neol bwaya boyeo*

[Chorus: All, Chenle, Kun]

Bami omyeon bicheul naeneun byeoldeuldo

Noeulman namgin chae jineun jeo taeyangdo

Da jeomada dokteukan saegeul gajyeo

Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful

Sesang modeun ge jejaril chajeul ttae

Deo areumdapge binnaneun geon waeilkka

Geu moseup geudaero chungbunhaeyo

Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful you are

[Chorus: All, Xiaojun, Doyoung]

Saeropge sijakaeyo duryeowodo malgo

Modeun ge jal doel teni geokjeonghaji mayo

Jasineul minneun sungan geu sungan

Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful

Geudaen jiguui hanappunin geureon saram

Sesangeul binnaejul sunganeul gidaryeoyo

Geu moseup geudaero wanbyeokan geol

Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful you are

author: @カブルモ
text:
You're the most important person in your life So be yourself Be beautiful    く　ぬぐんがえ　さルむル　たムき　うぃへ 그 누군가의 삶을 닮기 위해 誰かの生き方を真似するために
 
こだなん　はるル　ぼねっとん　くで 고단한 하룰 보냈던 그대
疲れる一日を送った君
 
ちゃみ　どぅル　って　へんぼっかじ　あんたみょん 잠이 들 때 행복하지 않다면 眠りにつくとき幸せじゃないなら    もどぅが　ばらん　っくむル　っちょっちゃばぁど 모두가 바란 꿈을 쫓아봐도 みんなが望む夢を追ってみても
 
あん　まんぬん　おっちょろム　ちゃっく　と　ちゃがじょ 안 맞는 옷처럼 자꾸 더 작아져 合わない服みたいに小さくなるばかり
 
ね　たしん　ごや　いごっぷにらご 내 탓인 거야 이거뿐이라고 自分のせいだ　これしかないって
 
ぽぎはじ　まらよ 포기하지 말아요 諦めないで    ぱみ　おみょん　びっちゅル　ねぬん　びょルどぅルど 밤이 오면 빛을 내는 별들도 夜になると輝きだす星たちも
 
のうルまん　なムぎん　ちぇ　ちぬん　ちょ　てやんど 노을만 남긴 채 지는 저 태양도 夕焼けだけ残して沈む太陽も
 
た　ちょまだ　とっとぅっかん　せぐル　かじょ 다 저마다 독특한 색을 가져 みんなそれぞれの色を持ってる
 Beautiful yeah    せさん　もどぅん　げ　ちぇじゃりル　ちゃじゅル　って 세상 모든 게 제자릴 찾을 때 世界中のものが居場所を見つけたとき
 
と　あるムだプけ　ぴんなぬん　ごん　うぇいルっか 더 아름답게 빛나는 건 왜일까 もっと美しく輝くのはなぜだろう
 
く　もすプ　くでろ　ちゅんぶねよ 그 모습 그대로 충분해요 ありのままの姿でいいんだよ
 Beautiful beautiful you are    ねげん　おプたぬん　くろん　ほたらめ 내겐 없다는 그런 허탈함에 僕にはないという虚脱感に
 
く　ぬぐんがるル　ぶろうぉへっちょ 그 누군가를 부러워했죠 他の誰かを羨んだ
 
くで　かじん　ごん 그대 가진 건 君が持っているものは
 
くどぅれげん　ちょルて　おプそ　Yeah 그들에겐 절대 없어 Yeah その人たちには絶対にないよ　Yeah    こげル　ちょム　とぅろばぁ　ちゅうぃるル　とぅルろばぁ 고갤 좀 들어봐 주위를 둘러봐 ちょっと顔を上げて　周りを見てみて
 
くでまん　ばらぼぬん　さらムどぅり　いっちゃな 그대만 바라보는 사람들이 있잖아 君だけを見てる人達がいるでしょ
 
はなっぷにん　さらんぱんぬん　さらム 하나뿐인 사랑받는 사람 たった一つの愛をもらう人
 
くでん　くろん　さらム 그댄 그런 사람 君はそんな人   
 
ぱみ　おみょん　びっちゅル　ねぬん　びょルどぅルど 밤이 오면 빛을 내는 별들도 夜になると輝きだす星たちも
 
のうルまん　なムぎん　ちぇ　ちぬん　ちょ　てやんど 노을만 남긴 채 지는 저 태양도 夕焼けだけ残して沈む太陽も
 
た　ちょまだ　とっとぅっかん　せぐル　かじょ 다 저마다 독특한 색을 가져 みんなそれぞれの色を持ってる
 Beautiful yeah    せさん　もどぅん　げ　ちぇじゃりル　ちゃじゅル　って 세상 모든 게 제자릴 찾을 때 世界中のものが居場所を見つけたとき
 
と　あるムだプけ　ぴんなぬん　ごん　うぇいルっか 더 아름답게 빛나는 건 왜일까 もっと美しく輝くのはなぜだろう
 
く　もすプ　くでろ　ちゅんぶねよ 그 모습 그대로 충분해요 ありのままの姿でいいんだよ
 Beautiful beautiful you are
   かすみ　うぇちぬん　そりるル　とぅろばぁよ 가슴이 외치는 소리를 들어봐요 心が叫ぶ声を聞いてみて
 
かすム　ってぃぬん　すんがに　いっそっけっちょ 가슴 뛰는 순간이 있었겠죠 ドキドキした瞬間があったでしょ
 
へんぼぐル　ちゃじゃ　へめご　いんなよ 행복을 찾아 헤매고 있나요 幸せを探して彷徨ってるの？
 
ちょム　ど　まうめ　そりル　とぅろばぁ 좀 더 마음의 소릴 들어봐 もう少し心の声を聞いてみて    しじゃっけ　くでまね　よへん 시작해 그대만의 여행 始めて　君だけの旅を
 
きっぷむル　ちゃじゃがぬん　くでまね　Story
기쁨을 찾아가는 그대만의 Story 喜びを探していく君だけのStory
 
ちゃぐん　ご　ったなかじ
작은 것 하나까지 小さなこと一つまで
 
さらんはぬん　まうム　いっち　まらよ
사랑하는 마음 잊지 말아요 愛する気持ち　忘れないでね
 
 
 Beautiful life Beautiful heart  
さルめ　ぱルぐん　みょねそ
삶의 밝은 면에서 人生の明るい場面から
 
っとっとし　ちゃしぬル　ばぁ
떳떳이 자신을 봐 堂々と自分を見て
 
 
 
ちゃがじょ　がぬん　かっちゃえ　ぴっ 작아져 가는 각자의 빛 小さくなっていくそれぞれの光
 
のっぱじょ　がぬん　もクぴょち
높아져 가는 목표치 高くなっていく目標
 
そげ　くでまね　せク　いんぬん　くでろ
속에 그대만의 색 있는 그대로 の中で　君だけの色　ありのままで
 
とうっと　ぱルっけ　ぴんなル　す　いっきル
더욱더 밝게 빛날 수 있길 もっと明るく輝けるように
 
 
 This time You can face the rain Next time You can beat the pain No more tears will come again Smiling laughing to the end (yeah)    Put your bags down  
むごうん　しムじょんうル　ねげ　た　のムぎょ
무거운 심정을 내게 다 넘겨 重い気持ちを僕に渡して
 
もムちょ　いっそ　Time in a bottle
멈춰 있어 Time in a bottle 止まってる　Time in a bottle
 
のど　のル　ばぁや　ぼよ
너도 널 봐야 보여 君も君を見なきゃ見えない
 
 
 
ぱみ　おみょん　びっちゅル　ねぬん　びょルどぅルど 밤이 오면 빛을 내는 별들도 夜になると輝きだす星たちも
 
のうルまん　なムぎん　ちぇ　ちぬん　ちょ　てやんど 노을만 남긴 채 지는 저 태양도 夕焼けだけ残して沈む太陽も
 
た　ちょまだ　とっとぅっかん　せぐル　かじょ 다 저마다 독특한 색을 가져 みんなそれぞれの色を持ってる
 Beautiful yeah    せさん　もどぅん　げ　ちぇじゃりル　ちゃじゅル　って 세상 모든 게 제자릴 찾을 때 世界中のものが居場所を見つけたとき
 
と　あるムだプけ　ぴんなぬん　ごん　うぇいルっか 더 아름답게 빛나는 건 왜일까 もっと美しく輝くのはなぜだろう
 
く　もすプ　くでろ　ちゅんぶねよ 그 모습 그대로 충분해요 ありのままの姿でいいんだよ
 Beautiful beautiful you are
 
  せろプけ　しじゃっけよ　とぅりょうぉど　まルご 새롭게 시작해요 두려워도 말고 新しくスタートする　怖がりもしないで
 
もどぅん　げ　ちゃル　でぇル　てに　こっちょんはじ　まよ
모든 게 잘 될 테니 걱정하지 마요 すべて上手くいくから　心配しないで
 
ちゃしぬル　みんぬん　すんがん　く　すんがん
자신을 믿는 순간 그 순간 自分を信じる瞬間　その瞬間
 
Beautiful beautiful    くでん　ちぐえ　はなっぷにん　くろん　さらム 그댄 지구의 하나뿐인 그런 사람 君は地球のたった一人の人
 
せさんうル　ぴんねじゅル　すんがぬル　きだりょよ
세상을 빛내줄 순간을 기다려요 世界を輝かせてくれる瞬間を待ってるよ
 
く　もすプ　くでろ　わんびょっかん　ごル
그 모습 그대로 완벽한 걸 ありのままの姿で完璧なんだ
 
Beautiful beautiful you are

author: @nzramadhani_
text:
Lirik Lagu NCT 2021 “Beautiful" Romanized

Berikut lirik "Beautiful" dari NCT 2021 romanized seperti dikutip dari situs Genius:

[Intro: Johnny]

You're the most important person in your life

So be yourself, be beautiful

[Verse 1: Jaehyun, Jaemin & Jaehyun, Jungwoo, Chenle]

Geu nugungaui saleul dalgi wihae

Godanhan harul bonaetdeon geudae

Jami deul ttae haengbokaji antamyeon

Moduga baran kkumeul jjochabwado

An manneun otcheoreom jakku deo jagajyeo

Nae tasin geoya igeoppunirago

Pogihaji marayo

[Chorus: All, Haechan, Ten]

Bami omyeon bicheul naeneun byeoldeuldo

Noeulman namgin chae jineun jeo taeyangdo

Da jeomada dokteukan saegeul gajyeo

Beautiful, beautiful, yeah

Sesang modeun ge jejaril chajeul ttae

Deo areumdapge binnaneun geon waeilkka

Geu moseup geudaero chungbunhaeyo

Beautiful, beautiful you are

[Verse 2: Jisung & Renjun, Xiaojun, Doyoung & Sungchan, Taeil]

Naegen eopdaneun geureon heotalhame

Geu nugungareul bureowohaetjyo

Geudae gajin geon

Geudeuregen jeoldae eopseo, yeah

Gogael jom deureobwa juwireul dulleobwa

Geudaeman baraboneun saramdeuri itjana

Hanappunin sarangbanneun saram

Geudaen geureon saram

[Chorus: All, Yuta, Renjun]

Bami omyeon bicheul naeneun byeoldeuldo

Noeulman namgin chae jineun jeo taeyangdo

Da jeomada dokteukan saegeul gajyeo

Beautiful, beautiful, yeah

Sesang modeun ge jejaril chajeul ttae

Deo areumdapge binnaneun geon waeilkka

Geu moseup geudaero chungbunhaeyo

Beautiful, beautiful you are

[Bridge: Haechan, Johnny & Jungwoo, Doyoung & Kun, Jaehyun & Shotaro, *Yangyang & Ten*, **Taeil**]

Gaseumi oechineun sorireul deureobwayo

Gaseum ttwineun sungani isseotgetjyo

Haengbogeul chaja hemaego innayo

Jom deo maeumui soril deureobwa

*sijakae geudaemanui yeohaeng

Gippeumeul chajaganeun geudaemanui story*

**jageun geot hanakkaji

Saranghaneun maeum itji marayo**

[Verse 3: Taeyong, Jeno, Hendery, Taeil, *Mark*]

Beautiful life, beautiful heart

Salui balgeun myeoneseo

Tteottteosi jasineul bwa

Jagajyeo ganeun gakjaui bit

Nopajyeo ganeun mokpyochi

Soge geudaemanui saek inneun geudaero

Deoukdeo balge binnal su itgil

This time you can face the rain

Next time you can beat the pain

No more tears will come again

Smiling, laughing to the end (Yeah)

*Put your bags down

Mugeoun simjeongeul naege da neomgyeo

Meomchwo isseo, time in a bottle

Neodo neol bwaya boyeo*

[Chorus: All, Chenle, Kun]

Bami omyeon bicheul naeneun byeoldeuldo

Noeulman namgin chae jineun jeo taeyangdo

Da jeomada dokteukan saegeul gajyeo

Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful

Sesang modeun ge jejaril chajeul ttae

Deo areumdapge binnaneun geon waeilkka

Geu moseup geudaero chungbunhaeyo

Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful you are

[Chorus: All, Xiaojun, Doyoung]

Saeropge sijakaeyo duryeowodo malgo

Modeun ge jal doel teni geokjeonghaji mayo

Jasineul minneun sungan geu sungan

Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful

Geudaen jiguui hanappunin geureon saram

Sesangeul binnaejul sunganeul gidaryeoyo

Geu moseup geudaero wanbyeokan geol

Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful you are

author: @Dila-bg4od
text:
You're the most important person in your life
So be yourself, be beautiful

그 누군가의 삶을 닮기 위해
고단한 하룰 보냈던 그대
잠이 들 때 행복하지 않다면
모두가 바란 꿈을 쫓아봐도
안 맞는 옷처럼 자꾸 더 작아져
내 탓인 거야 이거뿐이라고
포기하지 말아요

밤이 오면 빛을 내는 별들도
노을만 남긴 채 지는 저 태양도
다 저마다 독특한 색을 가져
Beautiful, beautiful, yeah
세상 모든 게 제자릴 찾을 때
더 아름답게 빛나는 건 왜일까
그 모습 그대로 충분해요
Beautiful, beautiful you are

내겐 없다는 그런 허탈함에
그 누군가를 부러워했죠
그대 가진 건
그들에겐 절대 없어, yeah
고갤 좀 들어봐 주위를 둘러봐
그대만 바라보는 사람들이 있잖아
하나뿐인 사랑받는 사람
그댄 그런 사람

밤이 오면 빛을 내는 별들도
노을만 남긴 채 지는 저 태양도
다 저마다 독특한 색을 가져
Beautiful, beautiful, yeah
세상 모든 게 제자릴 찾을 때
더 아름답게 빛나는 건 왜일까
그 모습 그대로 충분해요
Beautiful, beautiful you are

가슴이 외치는 소리를 들어봐요
가슴 뛰는 순간이 있었겠죠
행복을 찾아 헤매고 있나요
좀 더 마음의 소릴 들어봐
시작해 그대만의 여행
기쁨을 찾아가는 그대만의 story
작은 것 하나까지
사랑하는 마음 잊지 말아요

Beautiful life, beautiful heart
삶의 밝은 면에서
떳떳이 자신을 봐
작아져 가는 각자의 빛
높아져 가는 목표치
속에 그대만의 색 있는 그대로
더욱더 밝게 빛날 수 있길
This time you can face the rain
Next time you can beat the pain
No more tears will come again
Smiling, laughing to the end (Yeah)
Put your bags down
무거운 심정을 내게 다 넘겨
멈춰 있어, time in a bottle
너도 널 봐야 보여

밤이 오면 빛을 내는 별들도
노을만 남긴 채 지는 저 태양도
다 저마다 독특한 색을 가져
Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful
세상 모든 게 제자릴 찾을 때
더 아름답게 빛나는 건 왜일까
그 모습 그대로 충분해요
Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful you are

새롭게 시작해요 두려워도 말고
모든 게 잘 될 테니 걱정하지 마요
자신을 믿는 순간 그 순간
Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful
그댄 지구의 하나뿐인 그런 사람
세상을 빛내줄 순간을 기다려요
그 모습 그대로 완벽한 걸
Beautiful, beautiful you are

author: @Mooniestarry
text: 2021 was the year NCT saved my life. I've been so severely depressed especially in the ending of the year- I didn't think I was going to make it to see 2022. But NCT have so much fun, positive content and music  that it helped me to keep going- and they are STILL helping me in this depression. I've been so low but I owe them many thanks. Also Taeil is everything. 💚

author: @jourenee
text: We’ve come a long way. Before they would need Taeyong to be the center or to be part of every track or video to catch people’s attention. Now… the title track for this album doesn’t even have Taeyong in it, this song we didn’t get Taeyong until the last 1/3 of the song. And Taeyong isn’t the ending center. He has done a fantastic job representing and leading them in the beginning, now he’s letting others shine. And they’re shining alright!

author: @대복박-f3l
text:
<⚽️ 이러한 짓까지 해서 돈을 벌고 싶은가?>
🇰🇷 한국 ⚽️ 축구협회 회장 정몽규🧒 HDC 현대산업개발 IPARK 정몽규🧒 이러고도 재개발 재건축 리모델링 수주를 할려고 하는냐?
현대산업개발 아이파크 정몽규 부천약대주공 재건축 조합원 40개동 1034세대 추가분담금 1368억원 발생시킴 왜 1368억 발생 된건지 근거를 재시해봐? 아울러 확정지분제 에서 도급제로 변경시켜 조합원 엄청난 피해봄 설계대로 공사를 안해서 단지내 도로폭이 좁아져 준공과 등기가 늦게 나며 조합원께 엄청난 피해줌 아파트 단지내 땅 파놓고 추가분담금 올려 달라고 거의 1년간 공사를 중단해 빗물이 고여서 소중한 아이들 2명 씩이나 물에 빠져 사망케 했으니 살인 죄 맞지요? 현산 아이파크 정몽규 약대주공 조합원께 엄청난 피해를 보상하라? 현산 아이파크 정몽규 이러고도 재개발 재건축 리모델링 수주할 자격이 있는가? 제 2의 약대주공 만들지 마라?
< 재개발 재건축 리모델링 조합원님 >
현산 정몽규 에게 재개발 재건축 리모델링
맡길 것입니까? 고기도 먹어 본놈이 잘먹는 다고 약대주공 처럼 추가분담금 폭탄 맞을수도 있겠죠? 시공사 선택은 조합원님 몫 꼼꼼하게 따져서 선택을 하셔야 내 재산을 챙기시는 지름길이 아닐까요?
축구협회 회장 정몽규🧒 약대주공 시공 잘못한것 조합원께 피해를 보상하라? HDC 현대산업개발 IPARK 정몽규🧒 시공사 의 갑질 행태임 정몽규 확정지분제 계약했지만 1기 조합장때 도급제 변경 총회를 열어 부결이 되자 반복해서 총회를 열어 통과 시키는 이런 악날한 갑질이 세상 어디에 또 있을까요? 
도급제 총회는 1기 조합장 임의로 열지 말았어야 맞지요 조합장 과 정몽규 와 확정지분제 게약이 이미 성립 되었으니 말입니다
현대산업개발 과 약대주공 간에 확정지분제 계약을 했음에도 이러한 나쁜짓을 한 정몽규 계약위반 맞지요?
저 또한 1기 조합을 믿고 있었지만 이미 늦었고 해서 1기 조합장 해임 시키고 2기 조합장 때부터 조합을 지키며 감시를 했지만 역시나 믿었던 2기 조합장 놈도  조합원을 배신하고 현산 정몽규 편에 서는 바람에 해임 시키고 저는 3기 조합장 으로 새로운 출발을 하였습니다 시공사 와 결탁 없이 오로지 조합원을 위하여 이정주 변호사 와 함께 저의 재산과 조합원의 재산만 지키기 위하여 노력을 했습니다
제가 3기 조합장이 되었지만 현산의 갑질에 협조를 안할게 뻔해서 그런지 HDC 현대산업개발 IPARK 정몽규🧒 가 조합에 자금을 보내줘야 조합 운영을 할수가 있었는데 정몽규가 돈을 보내주지 않고 돈줄을 막았으니 식물 조합을 만들려 한것이 분명 하지요? 이정도면 축구협회 회장 정몽규🧒 가 악날한 사람이 맞지요?
그러나 -->
HDC 현대산업개발 IPARK 정몽규🧒 가 조합에 보낼 자금을 보내지 않아서 조합원들 께서 스스로 기금을 모아서 조합사무실 운영을 했지요 정몽규 가 이렇게 악날한 사람인줄 누가 알겠습니까?
저를 비롯하여 임원들 모두가 용산역 현산 본사를 찾아 갔지만 문턱도 넘어보지 못하고 돌아섰을때 조합원을 대표해서 찾아간 임원 모두가  무시를 당했다는건 조합원을 무시 한게 아닐까요? 이러한 축구협회 회장 정몽규🧒 의 갑질 행위 때문에 저는 전국에 재개발 재건축 리모델링 하시는 조합원님께 널리 알리고자 소중하고 아까운 시간을 쪼개서 오늘도 이렇게 댓글을 올리고 있습니다
현대산업개발 에서 재개발 재건축 리모델링 수주 경쟁을 하는곳 아신다면 댓글로 달아 주시면 감사하겠습니다 가정축복, 건강축복, 사업번창 하실것을 간절히 소망합니다
          약대주공  3번째  조합장  박대복

author: @starlaa419
text:
Ga berasa ya besok udah ganti tahun aja, ulang tahunnya Kun hehe. Perasaan belum lama deh tanggal 1 Januari 2021.

Walaupun tahun 2021 ini ga semua hal itu selalu Beautiful tapi ada NCT yang bikin hidup ini lebih Beautiful. Semoga tahun 2022 lebih Beautiful ya. Tapi inget ya, ga semua itu harus seneng-seneng mulu pasti akan diimbangi dengan kebalikannya. Tapi harapannya sih banyak senengnya hehe.



Kalau kamu punya masalah itu wajar, semua manusia juga punya masalah kok. Saranku kamu cuma perlu percaya kalau semua masalah pasti ada waktunya jangan lupa juga sama usaha doa juga hehe. Masalah itu jangan terlalu dipikirin tapi bukan berarti ga dipikirin, ya gitulah. 

Sehat selalu ya semua, jangan sakit, ga enak. Yang sakit semoga cepet sembuh ♡.  Semangat buat tahun baru 2022. Mau bakar apa nih??


Maaf ya kalo rada ga jelas dan muter-muter, makasih juga kalau ada yang baca sampe sini. Udah gitu aja deh kayaknya. 

-Love

author: @므엉도영
text:
그래 정우야 니 목소리가 내귀에 있는 먼지들도 갑자기 정신차리게 한다...동영이는 모든 세포들을 일깨워주고 인준이는 ㄹㅇ 요정이고 재민이는 걍 오ㄹㅈㄷ고 제노야 사랑해 지성이는 귀여버 동혁아 사랑해 태.태 둘다 댕쩔고
밤비는 걍 할말없고(그만큼 갓벽!)
쫑천러는 보관이 시급하고 양양이는 사랑하고 오쥔이는 진짜 미쳤고 헨드리 ㄹㅇ 목소리 부드럽고 맠는 솔직히 진짜 약간 사랑하고...쟈니 하..멋져 윳따는 진짜 전설. 쿤아 러빙유 아 몰라 NCT사랑해💚

author: @sc9376
text: JOHNNY was the perfect choice to say the opening lines, HENDERY delivered his rap lyrics on point & hit straight to the heart, loved loved seeing more of my biases SHOTARO (the reason I found NCT to begin with) & YUTA - our focus is just drawn to those two wherever they are in the performance, loved that we finally got to see KUN in an upbeat NCT U song, TAEYONG - he just always is a magnetic presence as the leader of NCT & totally delivered his lyrics on point and as usual, TAEIL just slayed his vocals!! Everyone did a great job, but the ones mentioned were the standouts for us!! 👏👏👏 Our group has repeatedly watched this video & totally love it!! We really hope we get to see more of SHOTARO & YUTA in more performances of NCT or even solo projects!! 😁🥰😍♥️💚✨🎶🎤🎵✨💚

text:
Believe it or not ,this song made me happen the desire to know what is NCT,who are NCT members,like that.Of course I've already heard their gp name,some of members( from TV shows and also in Super M.) but it's the first song I listened to their whole work. Only this one song is enough for me.While I listened to EXO's, I suddenly found it on my algorithm and noticed it was just 13 minutes ago then I clicked it and finally  I listened this masterpiece again and again.For me,it does'nt matter which fandom  are you in,but if you can't accept that this one is worth to ,you can't say yrself as real kpop lover. 

I love BEAUTIFUL. 
I appreciate your whole team those who belong to BEAUTIFUL.

author: @ArielStar
text:
This was going to be their NCT U debut song. I'm glad they saved it for now. I know that NCT 2021 has been flying right past us so quickly, but once this song came out, I felt that everything was going to be okay. It's a bittersweet feeling, to be honest. Time is going by quickly, and NCT 127 and NCT Dream are already a senior group. Take me back to their debut, so that I can experience the amazing ride again, haha. 
I'm really glad they added Shotaro and Sungchan last year and will be making a new unit. NCT Forever. I really adore this brilliant and beautiful group.

text: Merry Christmas, boys 🎄.  I would look forward seeing you guys grow up as great adults. Don't lose your way, no matter where life takes you. Sometimes, life will break you but that is how it is. Life is not a bed of roses, but every time, you will come out stronger and wiser. Just call to God and remain with people who are true to you. text: seneng banget, melihat kalian bernyanyi bersama membuatku bahagia, aku hampir menangis mendengarkan lagu yang penuh makna dan lirik yang membuat semangat kembaliㅠㅠ lagu ini yang paling pas untuk semua orang!! terimakasih NCT kalian sudah membuat warna baru dan menjadi tempatku bersandar ketika aku dalam keadaan buruk, saya harap kalian bukan hanya dapat membahagiakan kami tetapi kalian juga harus menjalani hidup bahagia dengan keinginan kalian karena ini hidup kalian!! jangan sampai sakit dan stress sehatlah selalu untuk membuat kami tersenyum,  jalani hidupmu dengan baik aku sangat mencintai kalian I OVE YOU♡♡♡♡♡♡♡

author: @dinianggraeni8232
text: untuk semua member NCT (termasuk Lucas dan Winwin yang lagi gaada di comeback ini). Terima kasih atas hiburan yang udah kalian kasih buat Sijeuni khususnya diri aku sendiri. walaupun aku baru stan kalian tahun 2019 dan belum terlalu dalam kenal kalian, tapi kalian adalah salah satu alesan aku bisa survive, bisa bertahan hidup sampe detik ini, kalian sangat banyak membawa kebahagiaan buat aku dan fans kalian lainnya, kalian bantu aku buat bangkit dari kerasnya dunia dan sulitnya hidup. terkadang untuk bernafas aja sulit karena terlalu sesak buat menahan semua rasa sakit yang dialamin, tapi kalian dengan tulus memberikan warna di hidup aku yang abu-abu ini. kalian harus tau, kalian udah bantu aku bangkit dari fikiran buruk 2x ingin mengakhiri hidup. kalian sangat berarti di hidup aku, kalian ada untuk aku membantu bangkit dari mental aku yang kacau berantakan, kalian hadir untuk meringankan depresi yang sedang aku alami. maaf untuk kalian, karena aku belum bisa jadi fans royal&loyal buat support kerja keras kalian. tapi semoga impian dan cita-cita aku bisa terwujud dan membeli segala macam yang agensi kalian jual dan semoga aku bisa ketemu kalian. aku sayang NCT, sangat! 💚

text: I really like it ini sungguh luar biasa, my heart berdebar debar dag dig dug rindu kami terobati oleh performance Nct kali ini, terimakasih banyak karena  kalian hidup kami jadi lebih berwarna  seperti  pelangi, karena kalian kami termotivasi karena kalian kami bangkit dari keterpurukkan, karena kalian kami menjadi lebih bersemangat menjalani hidup, terimakasih nct sudah ada untuk kami Nctzen, terimakasih untuk kerja keras kalian pasti itu sangat melelahkan, tapi jangan lupakan kesehatan kalian juga, tetap baik baik saja ya jangan dengarkan omongan haters, kami sungguh menyayangi kalian kami sangat merindukan kalian, kami berharap suatu saat nanti kita bisa bertemu dengan kalian, aku juga merindukan lucas oppa dan winwin oppa, kami benar benar sangat mencintai kalian Nct jadi tetaplah sehat dan bahagia jangan terlalu banyak pikiran dan jagalah pola makan kalian agar tetap sehat, aku harap pandemi segera berakhir aku ingin sekali bertemu kalian, dan konser sm akan segera tiba kami sangat menantikkan itu, kami ingin melihat para idol kami bersemangat diatas panggung, terimakasih atas usahanya untuk kami nctzen, kami menyayangi kalian, we love you nct, ku harap kalian dapat membaca ini walaupun aku tak bisa bahasa korea, tapi sekarang aku sedang mempelajarinya, karena kalian aku jadi bersemangat untuk mempelajari bahasa bahasa yang ada, kami sangat sayang kalian terima kasih sekali lagi sudah hadir untuk kami.

author: @jezamider4959
text: NCT Thank you for making my Christmas merry! I lost friends and family because of my depression, poor judgment and decisions yet even I've been working my best all seems to fail and still ends not well. My brother has abandoned me and no longer considers me as his sister just because I can't speak what I really feel, what's killing me inside. Thank you for Beautiful, cause the tears are flowing now and I am filled with warmth and hope that someday as long as I continue to fight and do things right, even in small steps, a beautiful tomorrow will come. Hendery's rap, "This time you can face the rain, next time you can beat the pain, no more tears will come again, smiling & laughing til' the end" --- I'll claim this, soon I'll literal congratulate myself for beating depression. Thank you again! Happy holidays!
